name: Lonely shooter
description: Simple shooting casual game, where to hit.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*
